text: Newstral Article [Ddrivencarguide.co.nz](/en/sources/475571) on 2024-10-18 00:06 Kia unveils world's first car accessory made from ocean plastic Related news [Plastic catcher heads for ocean clean-up](https://www.bbc.com/news/science-environment-45438736)[BBC](/en/sources/30)[A](http://augustafreepress.com)[Earth Talk: Plastic in the ocean](https://augustafreepress.com/earth-talk-plastic-in-the-ocean/)[augustafreepress.com](/en/sources/29198)[Device going in to corral plastic trash in ocean](https://www.arkansasonline.com/news/2018/sep/09/device-going-in-to-corral-plastic-trash/)[Arkansas Online](/en/sources/28454)[Ocean Cleanup’s New Plastic-Catcher … Kinda Already Exists?](https://www.wired.com/story/ocean-cleanup-interceptor)[Wired.com](/en/sources/118)[Huge barrier isn’t trapping plastic waste in Pacific Ocean](https://www.kansas.com/news/business/article223218185.html#storylink=rss)[The Wichita Eagle](/en/sources/29145),,,,[Device to trap plastic waste in Pacific Ocean relaunches](https://www.seattletimes.com/nation-world/nation/device-to-trap-plastic-waste-in-pacific-ocean-relaunches/?utm_source=RSS&utm_medium=Referral&utm_campaign=RSS_all)[Seattle Times](/en/sources/182)[Ocean Cleanup's Plastic Catcher Is Busted.
